Text: FW ubswenergycom URGENT Cc We need to keep this issue in the forefront to avoid any future costly mistakes Mark Original Message From Petrie James Sent Wednesday January AM To Zimmer Janet Bridges Mark Barrett Beth Halligan Laura Robinson Claudia Cc Eber Louis Subject RE ubswenergycom URGENT I sent revisions to the FAQs and the cover letter to Kal Shah and Leslie Hansen last night Kal assures me that all of the changes I suggested including the deletion of any mention of ubswenergy other than as part of a web address were being made Accordingly I think the message is getting through Also in conversations with Mark Taylor I stressed that no trademark registration was to be made pointing out that the use of the url was intended to be temporary Mark had not had anything to do with a possible registration of the mark other than receiving a phone mail message We will see how things go however I believe the message has gotten through for now Jim Original Message From Zimmer Janet Sent Wednesday January AM To Bridges Mark Barrett Beth Halligan Laura Robinson Claudia Cc Eber Louis Petrie James Subject RE ubswenergycom URGENT The broader issue perhaps is that they appear to be namingbranding the online trading system UBSWenergy and using that as a marketing name for their business For example I had heard they wanted to trademark the term Even if they have approval to use the website name temporarily does it make sense to go out with a marketing name that might be killed in months and for which we may not have approval to trademark Maybe not a popular position if Costas is behind this but we should be sure everyone is clear on the possible ramifications Just so you know there are some intellectual property considerations behind this In order to best protect the UBS and UBS Warburg names group does not like us to weaken them by using UBSW Janet Zimmer UBS Warburg Region Americas fax Original Message From Bridges Mark Sent Wednesday January AM To Barrett Beth Halligan Laura Robinson Claudia Cc Eber Louis Zimmer Janet Subject FW ubswenergycom URGENT fyi problem solved Mark Original Message From Mills Ursula Sent Wednesday January AM To Bridges Mark Subject FW ubswenergycom URGENT fyi Original Message From Costas John Sent Wednesday January AM To Mills Ursula Subject Re FW ubswenergycom URGENT Heidi has now agreed to go ahead with the wwwubswenergycom for the first months I promised her a debate thenso for now move ahead JC Reply Separator Subject FW ubswenergycom URGENT Author Ursula Mills at lndlondonifdit Date this is the response that we have just received from group marketing all relaunch efforts have now had to be put on hold as switzerland control the naming of the DNS servers pls could John or Mike put in an urgent call to Heidi Baumann to square this one away fyi the individual in UBSW Comms Marketing who originally signed off this request Stuart Hepburn has since left the bank thx Ursula Original Message From Robert Mathez Sent January To Isabelle zhdyp Dauberschmidt Judit Kiss Cc Heidi Baumann BobHillier Mark Branson JarodJenson JohnDevitofranceschi James Petrie Steve Russell Markus zhscx Schaerli SHHostmaster Subject RE ubswenergycom Changing authoritative servers Hi Isabelle On behalf of group marketing Heidi Baumann I have to reject this request wwwubswenergycom must not be visible but may be used as a hidden technical url eg wwwubwwcomenergy would be OK or oldstyle wwwubswcomenergy Robert Mathez Web Quality Management Original Message From Dauberschmidt Isabelle zhdyp Sent Montag Januar To Kiss Judit Mathez Robert Cc JarodJenson BobHillier Petrie James Russell Steve SHHostmaster JohnDevitofranceschi Subject RE ubswenergycom Changing authoritative servers Hi Judit hi Robert We set the DNS servers temporarily on what the customer ordered as it seems to be very time critical It should be seen on the internet by tomorrow at latest Nevertheless this activation needs to be signedoff Please do so asap and reply to Thanks Rgds Mit freundlichen Grssen Telecom Network Services econnectivity IEWIsabelle Dauberschmidt Tel Suri bitte mache die ntigen Anpassungen im Exelsheet danke Original Message From JohnDevitofranceschi Sent Freitag Januar To SHHostmaster Dauberschmidt Isabelle zhdyp Cc JohnDevitofranceschi JarodJenson BobHillier Petrie James Russell Steve Subject ubswenergycom Changing authoritative servers It is crucial that the DNS servers for ubswenergycom be set as follows as soon as possible dnsextubswenergycom dnsextubswenergycom It is entirely possible that the names dnsextubswenergycom and dnsextubswenergycom will be rejected because the IP addresses associated with those names are already associated with dnsextenrononlinecom and dnsextenrononlinecom If this is the case it will be necessary to use the enrononlinecom domain names for the DNS servers and then change the server names later once ubswenergy is online and ready As long as the servers provide information about both domains this should be possible jd John Devitofranceschi perotsystems UBSW Unix Engineering Stamford Never use ASCII text when a Microsoft product will do I have never understood why it should be necessary to become irrational in order to prove that you care or indeed why it should be necessary to prove it at all Kerr Avon Duel Real estate issues re UBSW Energy LLC in Houston Cc Hello Pat Louise Dave The UBSW real estate department is reviewing the currentfuture lease terms for UBSW Energy LLC in Houston According to Brian Dugan our lead real estate guy on the bank side the building owner has offered a nine month lease to stay in the South Tower on the th and th floors After the nine months we will be offered the option to sign up for an additional months but we could be moved down to floors and Is this a significant issue I understand that the rd and th floor foot prints are similar to If UBSW Energy is willing to relocate to the North Tower they can get a lease for years but this tower may be less suitable What are the issues here The integration real estate team plans to meet this afternoon with the Banks outside legal firm we use for real estate issues We have a target date of this Friday to try to resolve all real estate issues in order to meet the DAY legal integration date of Your thoughts please Mark Visit our website at This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree as information could be intercepted corrupted lost destroyed arrive late or incomplete or contain viruses The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of email transmission If verification is required please request a hardcopy version This message is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed as a solicitation or offer to buy or sell any securities or related financial instruments

Need names of Enron Integration team Counterparts ASAPpst As agreed at last Thursdays Integration team meeting please send the names of your Enron integration counterparts I need these names ASAP so we can begin to include Enron in the Thursday am ESTam CST weekly meetings So far we have received the names from Mkt RiskCredit Risk only PS Call in number for Thursdays call is PIN Free phone in USA PIN Save this number it will be used for all future Integration Team meetings rgds Mark Visit our website at This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree as information could be intercepted corrupted lost destroyed arrive late or incomplete or contain viruses The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of email transmission If verification is required please request a hardcopy version This message is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed as a solicitation or offer to buy or sell any securities or related financial instruments

FW Physical Access ID Cards for access to Enronpst UBSW Regional Security has coordinated the following access control procedures with Enron Security We request that all visitors to EnronHouston complex follow this process Forward an emailbefore your departureto Regional SecurityNikki Canavan requesting access to Enron in Houston Texas Regional Security will authorize and forward these names to Enron security UBS employees should go to main lobby reception desk at Smith Street in the North Tower to obtain their temporary IDs UBS employees should inform the receptionistsecurity officers that their names have been forwarded to Enron security Enron receptionistsecurity personnel will give the UBS employees a temporary access card to the building which will be valid for hours only UBS employees will be required to show a valid stateDrivers License or federalpassport identification prior to the issuance of this temporary ID card UBS employees intending to stay more than one day will then need to call Enron security at to arrange to have their photo taken and then they will be issued an Enron access card This card will be valid for seven business days If your visit to Enron will exceed business days please include that information on your email Forward all questionscomments to Nikki Canavan in Stamford or call UBSW Regional Security Management can be notified via our security console desk which is operational hours a day days a week Rgds Mark Visit our website at This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system UBS Warburg Energy LLC Integration Status Reportpst All The following are highlights of todays Integration Team meeting All areas are on track for a successful legal closing of and st day trading of Canada Three open issues Parent Guarantee Some legal entity issues Capitalfunding requirements A work plan is in place for all three issues but may not be completed by Worst case only a few days delay in start trading This has NO IMPACT on day one trading in the US United States No show stoppers in US to prevent Legal Close or First Day Trading Open issues are Legal Status Green Clients must have a Master Agreement or Adoption Agreement or General terms and Conditions GTC in place before trading can commence Getting agreements in place is slow process weeks to months Legal and Credit Risk are working hard to approve as many clients as possible from Energy LLC approved list of This impacts the number of clients that can trade on day one Business expectations have been set for day one Business Status Green No additional issuesconcerns from Louise Kitchen COO UBS Warburg Energy LLC No additional issues from CFI or Pat ODonnel Credit Risk Status Green For Day one traders will not have access to credit information Credit Risk will distribute list of approved clients to traders and traders will have to call for credit approval Mkt Risk Status Green Walter Stuerzinger needs to approve VAR models EBK briefing on VAR is important FCD Status Green Some open issues surrounding SEC requirements but they are being addressed An expedited approval process will be used to resolve Day one exposure issues if they occur Operations Status green Leadtime for templates used for counterparty approvals is hours Leadtime for confirmation templates is hours Impact dont make leadtime dont trade with this client IRDerivative settlement process not ready yet but being worked by OpsCredit Corp Comm Status Green WEB site look and feel and contents complete Need sign off by legalbusiness louise Kitchen Day one communications to clientsemployees ready There will be a conference call on Thurs February th at EST where the Go NoGo decision will be made for the Day Legal Closing Dial in PIN There will be a conf call on Friday February th at EST where the Go NoGo decision will be made for the Day Commercial Integration on Monday February th Same dial in numberpin
